name: Sausage Run: Run, Jump & Fun
description:
Run, Sausage, adventure run 2018!
Hot diggity dog, that’s a fine looking’ hot dog!
You never sausage a sausage! (Get it? Saw such… sausage? Anyone?)

Sapristi! This is a great sausage!
You will never have crossed sausage also sauciphonnée!!
New Run sausage adventure run ! is a free adventure racing game.

Run sausage adventure run is a challenging runner-game. Help the Sausage to escape from the kitchen. Run for your life!
The main hero of this story is a Sausage that is trying to survive. The kitchen is very dangerous and full of obstacles.
Save the sausage and let it re-join with friends and start the party.

New Run sausage! again want to collect more coins. But there are many obstacles and keys, etc.
Help Sausage Run! and with running and jumping and tap the screen to jump and avoid obstacles. Get the most fun and entertainment with Sausage Run! game Control the adventure game going on and he loves the sausage and collect more and more coins as you can Come on the adventure and overcome the challenges that come in the way This adventure game is very easy to play, including many obstacles and challenges. The control is also very easy. Just tap the screen for the New Run sausage makeup! and jump to continue the race and score the most points by collecting coins. All full of succulent sausages to choose from, full of the avatar to select to enjoy this adventure race.


THE GAME RULES

To finish the game New Run sausage adventure run you should pass numerous levels. Each level contains a mission – collecting stars, destroying obstacles or surviving for a period of time.
All you can do is jumping and sliding to avoid the obstacles. Tap the right side of the screen to jump and left – to duck.
If you collide with something, the cook’s knife will slice you in a
During the game, you can pick up a hot Sauce. It enables the unleashed burning power and the Sausage starts to run really fast. While the sauce effect is still continuing, the Sausage destroys everything on its way. This is how you can complete missions with destroying obstacles number.

New Run sausage! can be played for both children and adults.

There are many more than 130 levels and more to come We hope you enjoy this free game.


+ Run and jump through a funny and challenging world.

+ Many Addictive levels!!

+ Amazing worlds!!

+ free Game!!

Have fun !!
